footer.text: Character Guide • Synergy: Kamisato Ayaka | Update Date: 11/07/2022 | Editor: Effab1e#2963

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
Ayaka is usually used in __Freeze teams__ with the other units being replaceable within their elements. Mono Cryo and other teams like Melt are also options.
__**Hydro unit comparison:**__
__Kokomi__ offers heals and more offensive 2nd Cryo units.
__Mona__ offers buffing but no survivability and wants ~240 ER.
__Xingqiu/Yelan__ are good options but lack AOE hydro application.
__Barbara__ can be used as a free to play option.

Rotations and more info in full guide linked below.

title: Kamisato Ayaka | Team Composition and Synergy
